name: Mega Mini-Boss Mission Gauntlet
description:
Adventure Time Mega Mini-Boss Mission Gauntlet: The Trials of True Heroes and Adventurers is a fast paced, action-packed, quick-time game where you take on some of the toughest challenges in Ooo to train your body and mind in becoming a better hero and adventurer.

This game was created for the Adventure Time Gamemaking Frenzy Presented by Fantastic Arcade and Juegos Rancheros. The event was a 48 hour Adventure Time themed game jam that took place the weekend of September 14th through September 16th in the year 2012! Mega Mini-Boss Mission Gauntlet along with Adventure Minute and Must Party Forever were selected as the top three games of the jam!

Controls

  • Arrow Keys: Movement
  • Z Key: Action
  • Esc: Escape the game!

Credits

  • Art by Winston Powell
  • Code by Tyler Coleman
  • Music by Erik Bowen
